item.title: Opinion Poll by Promocija Plus for RTL, 1–4 July 2024 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions

item.description:

  • Radnička fronta (GUE/NGL): 0.5–1.6%
  • Most nezavisnih lista (ECR): 6.0–9.0%
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (RE): 0.5–1.6%
  • Domovinski pokret (ECR): 6.5–9.6%
  • Hrvatski suverenisti (ECR): 0.1–0.9%
  • Fokus na bitno (RE): 1.0–2.4%
  • Centar (RE): 0.1–0.9%
